quiz.question: Which metric helps measure influencer-driven sales from unique URLs?
Which approach reduces attribution leakage when tracking influencer-driven sales?
options: Using unique coupon codes and tracked links
Posting identical links across all creators
Relying on manual reconciliation of screenshots
quiz.answer: Using unique coupon codes and tracked links

quiz.question: Which platform is best known for short vertical video clips?
Which platform launched a Creator Fund focused on creator payouts in 2020?
Which U.S. legal concept has been applied when influencers misrepresent product experiences?
What is influencer marketing?
options: Brands partnering with creators to reach audiences
A platform charging creators subscription fees
A type of platform moderation policy
quiz.answer: Brands partnering with creators to reach audiences

quiz.question: What legal issue rose from influencer promotion of the 2017 Fyre Festival?
options: Failure to disclose paid promotions and misrepresentation
quiz.answer: Failure to disclose paid promotions and misrepresentation

quiz.question: Which platform launched a $200 million creator fund for YouTube Shorts in 2021?
Which platform is best known for long-form video content?
What is "affiliate marketing" for influencers?
options: Earning commission from tracked sales via links
A flat fee paid per sponsored post
quiz.answer: Earning commission from tracked sales via links

quiz.question: Which analytics approach attributes conversions across multiple influencer touchpoints?
What is a "hashtag" primarily used for?
Which platform's algorithm was originally known as EdgeRank?
Which analytics signal indicates an influencer's audience is highly niche and engaged?
